io.spine.server.storage.memory

Class InMemoryRecordStorage<I,R extends com.google.protobuf.Message>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.storage.AbstractStorage<I,R>
      • io.spine.server.storage.RecordStorage<I,R>
        • io.spine.server.storage.memory.InMemoryRecordStorage<I,R>
  • Type Parameters:
    I - the type of the record identifiers
    R - the type of the stored records
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Storage<I,R>, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class InMemoryRecordStorage<I,R extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
extends RecordStorage<I,R>
    An in-memory implementation of RecordStorage.

      • deleteRecord

        protected boolean deleteRecord(I id)
        Description copied from class: RecordStorage
        Performs the physical removal of the message record from the storage by the identifier of the record.

        In case the record with the specified identifier is not found in the storage, this method does nothing and returns false.

        Specified by:
        deleteRecord in class RecordStorage<I,R extends com.google.protobuf.Message>
        Parameters:
        id - identifier of the record to delete
        Returns:
        true if the record was deleted, or false if the record with the specified identifier was not found
